NOT FOR PUBLICATION: SUPPLEMENTAL APPENDIX A Data Appendix A.1 CE Data A.1.1 197273 CE Data We create a measure of nondurable consumption expenditures by adding the expenditures on food, alcohol, tobacco, fuel and utilities, telephone, other services, laundry, clothing, transportation, personal goods, recreation, reading, gifts, and other goods. The original size of the 197273 CE is 19,975 households. We keep households in our sample if they are headed by a married male who is between 30 and 65 years old and have nonzero food and income reports. In Table A.1 we report the number of households deleted from our sample during each sample selection requirement.
